headline: Research Halted Due to Undesired Model Use in Latest Update
bullets: User 'inari_no_kitsune' pauses research on Qualia due to matrix-integration being flagged as an undesired use.
Seeking official feedback channel to address the issue with Anthropic Developers.
hot_take: Could this be the start of stricter usage policies for AI models?

headline: Claude Now Connects to Your Health Data for Personalized Insights
bullets: Introducing Apple Health, Health Connect, HealthEx, and Function Health integrations.
Focused on privacy with explicit opt-in and no training use of health data.
hot_take: Is Claude the future of personalized healthcare management?
